thread.section_title: Lencred Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lencred | www.lencred.com
thread.title: William

author: William
title: William
text: I had the pleasure of dealing with Mr. Joel Wilson when I contacted LenCred for a business loan, and I couldn't be more pleased with his helpfulness and generosity in terms of time and advice. Joel guided me through the process and made some helpful suggestions along the way which will move my funding request forward so I can kick off my new business in short order. If the rest of the company is as customer-focused as Joel is, I look forward to a long and fruitful relationship with LenCred.
